short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vuesion CallClick enables Vuesion QXi agents to connect with their contacts directly from the browser with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vuesion QXi is a cloud telephony and contact center platform engineered by BBX Technologies.
Vuesion CallClick is a powerful extension designed to streamline your calling process. With just one click, instantly connect with your contacts directly from your browser. Whether you're managing customer support, sales calls, or personal contacts, Vuesion CallClick integrates seamlessly with Vuesion QXi to enhance your productivity and efficiency. Experience the convenience of rapid, hassle-free calling at your fingertips.
